results.title: [Kids' fun: a compilation of cartoon adventures]
results.creator_credit: Romania Film, Animafilm Studio and Castle Films
results.brief_description: A collection of Romanian and classic American animation. First up are four fun-filled Romanian cartoons designed for young children (Music and sound affects, no spoken words). The characters Michaela, Benny and Tommy are seen here having fun with all of their animal friends. Following is a collection of classic American cartoons made between the 1930’s and 1950’s including the first Heckle and Jeckle cartoon.

results.title: [Jazz festival]
results.brief_description: Filmed in 1972 at New York’s Lincoln Center Philharmonic Hall, this all-star swing and jazz festival features such giants as Count Basie and his Orchestra, Ella Fitzgerald, Benny Goodman and the Original Quartet, Duke Ellington and his Orchestra, Gene Krupa, the Dave Brubeck Quartet, Teddy Wilson, Joe Williams and Lionel Hampton. Hosted by the great Doc Severinsen the program includes such wonderful jazz classics as “Lady be good”, “Body and soul”, “Take five”, “It don’t mean a thing” and many more, climaxing with a tribute to the late and great Louis “Satchmo” Armstrong. A unique program by unique jazz talents.
